services.description1: I have full-stack development experience using Java frameworks and React on various projects. I use Redux for state management and Styled-components as well as MUI for styling. I am proficient in handling SQL and NoSQL databases, and I also work on designs using Figma.
services.description2: For real-time responsive design, I use and manage each actual device connected locally through the network. This is a method aimed at faster development.
services.description3: I participate in developer communities to refer to various logics, and I develop and test new logics through research, thereby improving my development skills.

about.title: About
about.description: I have experience in backend development using Java frameworks and in frontend development with React and TypeScript. I use Redux.js for state management and Styled-components as well as Material-UI for styling. These diverse experiences have allowed me to acquire full-stack development skills and improve my project management and team collaboration abilities according to the Agile methodology. I strive to continue growing and progressing as a developer.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Check out the latest blog posts
